analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the new rule proposed for the Office of Personnel Management to allow 50,000 federal employees to be reclassified as at-will employees under "Schedule Policy/Career", formerly known as "Schedule F".
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and emphasizes the importance of job security and protections against political firings, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and politicization.
